patthana15.5:1.1: Hetuṁ saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.5:2.1: Nahetuṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.5:3.1: Hetuṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
